Text: FW Does it suck yet Original Message From Randall Karl K SESE Sent November To Subject Does it suck yet Hello Rick How are things going Dumb question It could be worse I spoke with an enron guy who had stock worth MM at the high a year ago now its less than K At least you got your cash out and booked I would like to have a discussion at some point There may be some things of interest for you next life You have my contact details All the best Karl

RE Does it suck yet Rick I am back in London now I finish a project this week w a unit of Shell I have another project teed up for next week where I am working w a EAcumen a energy risk mgmt software co who is doing an deployment at TXU This co has an interesting product set simulationoptimization of portfolios including the asset side of the biz and they are based in BoulderSan Fran I also know there is some termoil and they may need a new CEO soon Any interest Otherwise lets continue brainstorming Good luck with your issues at hand karl Original Message From Buy Rick mailtoRick NRONcom Sent November To Randall Karl K SESE Subject RE Does it suck yet It sucks big time I need a rest Stay in touch Rick Original Message From Randall Karl K SESE Sent Thu AM To Buy Rick Cc Subject FW Does it suck yet Original Message From Randall Karl K SESE Sent November To Subject Does it suck yet Hello Rick How are things going Dumb question It could be worse I spoke with an enron guy who had stock worth MM at the high a year ago now its less than K At least you got your cash out and booked I would like to have a discussion at some point There may be some things of interest for you next life You have my contact details All the best Karl This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
